txt.en: 'Hah, good work!\n\n'There'll be no end to the amount of Orcs seeking positions of power, but we'll deal with them as they come.'
Einar will want to hear back from you.\n\nHe can be found outside Gazat-fark.
Einar has suggested eliminating a few of the smithy's forge-masters.\n\nThe forge-masters can be found in Gazat-fark and Durbángh.
Talk to Einar outside of Gazat-fark

'I have to admit, it's impressive that the Orcs here have managed to work so tirelessly. They have an army to equip, after all. But it's the forge-masters who are keeping order.\n\n'There are several forge-masters running the place, keeping an eye on the other Orcs and maintaining the army's demands. Defeat a few, and we'll sabotage their supply prospects in the meantime.'
Forge-masters oversee the work being done in Gazat-fark and Durbángh.
